meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Gwen Niksic Chris Horton Philip Tiu Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7259.

td.p: Gwen Niksic, a major account manager originally from Chicago, Illinois
Chris Horton, a data administrator originally from Manville, Rhode Island
Philip Tiu, an educator from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 3-day cash winnings total $96,598)

tr.td: ONE-VOWEL WORDS
GERSHWIN TUNES
ALL SORTS OF SANDWICHES
FOUNTAINS
WHAT'S GOING ON IN THE NEWS?
BEASTLY BOOK BLANKS
